welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rainham, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes, friendly locals, and rich history. We hope you'll enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all the treasures this city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to VIP and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and departure gates.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport caters to the needs of private and corporate jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
